summary.name: summary
summary.value: Cannot executing a database function where any argument contains a period

description.name: description

value.name: Zend_Db_Select
value.description: OO interface to building a SELECT SQL query.

value.body:
I cannot trigger the warning in question, that might in fact be from the database you are using?

Ideally, I would like to see a couple of things:

-1) information on the database you are using, adapter and so on-
2) the target query you think Zend_Db_Select should be producing

If you still find the issue, please reopen with above information. Thanks!

Edit:
I see you are using Postgres, but I still need the target SQL you are attempting to build, and ideally, some kind of scheme i can compare it against.
